title: Edible Cookie Dough Recipe with Snickers Bites
directions: Place Flour on a Baking Sheet and pop in the oven at 350 for just 5 minutes
Combine Butter, Sugar, Vanilla, and Heavy Cream in a Bowl and mix well
Slowly stir in Flour and Salt until well mixed
Add in Snickers Bites and Chocolate Chips
Scoop into a Bowl and Serve or Freeze in small 1” Balls on Parchment Paper for a treat that’s quick and easy!
ingredients: 1 cup mini chocolate chips of choice
